mapper.select: SELECT dic_id as id, name as name, status as status FROM T_DICT WHERE DT_ID = #{dt_id} ORDER BY code
SELECT dic_id as id, name as name, status as status FROM T_DICT WHERE DT_ID = #{dt_id} and status = 1 ORDER BY code
SELECT dic_id as id, name as name, status as status FROM T_DICT WHERE DT_ID = 23 AND rownum <= 5 ORDER BY code

select distinct dict.dic_id as id,dict.name as name,ct.admin_level as adminLevel from t_dict dict inner join t_cert_type ct on ct.teach_grade = dict.dic_id where dict.dt_id = 23 and rownum <= 5 order by dict.dic_id,dict.name,ct.admin_level ORDER BY code
select d.dic_id as id,d.name as name,d.STATUS as status from t_cert_type_link c left join t_dict d on c.edu_level_id=d.dic_id where c.ct_id= #{ct_id} ORDER BY code

select d.dic_id as id,d.name as name,d.STATUS as status from t_cert_type_link_extend c left join t_dict d on c.target_id=d.dic_id where c.link_id=(select ctl.ctl_id from t_cert_type_link ctl where ctl.ct_id = #{ct_id} and ctl.edu_level_id = #{eduLevel}) and c.target_type=1 ORDER BY code
SELECT d.dic_id AS id, d.name AS name FROM t_dict d where d.dt_id = #{dtId} and d.code = #{code}
